lead_paragraph: Annika Sorenstam shot a four-under-par 67 at the Stanford International Pro-Am in Aventura, Fla., drawing her within one shot of Young Kim at the midway point of the inaugural event, being contested at Turnberry Isle. Kim also shot a 67, matching her first-round score on Turnberry’s Miller track. Paula Creamer (71) and Angela Stanford (70) were both at two under.
